title.rendered: BLG articling students’ walkathon raises bursary funds for LAWS

content.rendered:
Even in light of COVID-19 restrictions and extended stay-at-home orders, 23 BLG articling students raised funds towards a LAWS bursary.  Because of their efforts, two LAWS graduates received $1,500 each to support them with their post-secondary studies.

Read the full story here.
